channel.title: Posts on Chenghao Li's Space
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Chenghao Li's Space

item.title: Online resources for improving english speaking
item.description: Obviously, speaking good English is essential to live in the UK. And as a non-native speaker, I often feel there are so many things I need to learn to improve my English speaking skills. Fluency is an important aspect, but not the only thing I should look at. Using the RIGHT works, the way I say it (tone, intonation, accent), and maybe a touch of humor:) can make a huge difference.

item.title: Football Team Photo
item.description: Today our football team, Warwick Origin Point Football Club (华威原点足球俱乐部), get a photographer coming to our training match and take some photos. Team photo, me at middle in back row

item.title: Reflections on the Birmingham Decarbonisation Summer School (BDSS)
item.description: Group Photo on Day one in BDSS I attended the Birmingham Decarsbonisation Summer School (BDSS) two weeks ago. It was 5 amazing days in the beautiful and historic University of Birmingham. I met some brilliant PhD researchers and post-docs during the event. Industrial experts from National Grid, SSEN, GE Vernova, and many more gave very technical talks. I learnt an awful of insights and knowledge about electrical power system and the challenges the UK’s National Grid (NG) is facing in the renewable energy era.

item.title: 蔡襄《十三日吉祥院探花》
item.description: 《十三日吉祥院探花》1 [宋代] 蔡襄2 花未全开月未圆，看花待月思依然。 明知花月无情物，若使多情更可怜。 译文 花还没有全开，月还没有全圆，可我仍旧

item.title: After I spent over 400 GBP, I realised...
item.description: I spent over 400 quid on betting on EURO Cup 2024 and I lost 144. Of course, it might not sound too much, but the point I want to make is not how much I lost rather what lessons I got from it and what YOU can to do avoid. Realisations stroke me last night when I lost 18 consecutive bets. No matter what strategy I use or how smart
